mapper.sql: t.id as id , t.channel as channel , t.name as name , t.mobile as mobile , t.status as status , t.tenant_id as tenantId , t.create_time as createTime , t.create_by as createBy , t.update_time as updateTime , t.update_by as updateBy , t.remark as remark
mapper.insert:
insert into t_sys_sms_white_list
id,
channel,
name,
mobile,
status,
tenant_id,
create_time,
create_by,
update_time,
update_by,
remark,
#{id},
#{channel},
#{name},
#{mobile},
#{status},
#{tenantId},
#{createTime},
#{createBy},
#{updateTime},
#{updateBy},
#{remark},
mapper.update:
update t_sys_sms_white_list
channel = #{channel},
name = #{name},
mobile = #{mobile},
status = #{status},
tenant_id = #{tenantId},
create_time = #{createTime},
create_by = #{createBy},
update_time = #{updateTime},
update_by = #{updateBy},
remark = #{remark},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select from t_sys_sms_white_list t where t.id=#{id}
select from t_sys_sms_white_list t where t.mobile = #{mobile}
